product_name: Jagwire Sleek Pro Road Lite Brake Pads
long_description: Jagwire Sleek Pro Road Lite brake pads offer lightweight, lasting braking performance and easy replacement. Replaceable inserts use Jagwire Pro Series pad compound to supply powerful braking and long-lasting performance. Compatible with SRAM and Shimano caliper-style braking systems. Hardware facilitates easy pad adjustment. Comes as a set of 2 brake shoes with replaceable pad inserts and mounting hardware.
short_description: Jagwire Sleek Pro Road Lite brake pads offer lightweight, lasting braking performance and easy replacement.
